field.label: Boxalino account name
field.comment: Please request your account with credentials by contacting support@boxalino.com

field.label: Boxalino password
field.comment: Please request your account with credentials by contacting support@boxalino.com

field.label: Data Index
field.comment: Boxalino Data Index for the account (development or production)

field.label: Additional Tables
field.comment: Optional: list of additional tables related to the products entity, separated by ','; the tables are to be exported as they are.

field.label: Properties to include in export
field.comment: Optional: list of product properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported except the ones defined as excluded properties (next parameter)

field.label: Properties to exclude from export
field.comment: Optional: list of product properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported, this field is ignored if the list of product properties to include is not empty.

field.label: Export product images URLs
field.comment: Optional: Export image and thumbnail image urls (not required if standard usage of search and recommendations in Magento, as Magento renders the images itself). If activated, makes export slower.

field.label: Export product URLs
field.comment: Optional: Export product urls (not required if standard usage of search and recommendations in Magento, as Magento renders the url itself).. If activated, makes export slower.

field.label: Use the base storeview as default
field.comment: Optional: If activated, the ratings percent value will use the default from store_id=0 (for ex: a store view without rating will inherit the baseline from store id 0).

field.label: Enable plugin scheduler control
field.comment: Use the Plugin Export Scheduler to set boundaries on the delta data export. Recommend when "Update by Schedule"/mview mode is used.

field.label: Delta-Delta Period
field.comment: The minimum time required between two consecutive delta exports (in minutes). Default value: 60min

field.label: Delta Daily Start
field.comment: Daily hour starting from the delta exports can be run

field.label: Delta Daily End
field.comment: Daily hour until when the delta exports can be run

field.label: Additional Tables
field.comment: Optional: list of additional tables related to the customers entity, separated by ','; the tables are to be exported as they are.

field.label: Properties to include in export
field.comment: Optional: list of customer properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported except the ones defined as excluded properties (next parameter)

field.label: Properties to exclude from export
field.comment: Optional: list of customer properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported, this field is ignored if the list of customer properties to include is not empty.

field.label: Additional Tables
field.comment: Optional: list of additional tables related to the transactions entity, separated by ','; the tables are to be exported as they are.

field.label: Properties to include in export
field.comment: Optional: list of transaction properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported except the ones defined as excluded properties (next parameter)

field.label: Properties to exclude from export
field.comment: Optional: list of transaction properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported, this field is ignored if the list of transaction properties to include is not empty.

field.label: Mode
field.comment: Choose how the transactions should be exported. For Incremental, the exporter will only export the last month.

field.label: DI Response Wait Time
field.comment: Optional: Keeping connection open to DI server in order to wait for processing the archive for any errors. Default set to 300(sec).

field.label: Local Temporary Archive Path
field.comment: If set, the exported archive will be temporary stored in that path; If empty, the archive will be created in the directory PHP stores temporary files by default. You can find out which one is it via sys_get_temp_dir().

field.label: Publish configuration changes automatically
field.comment: True by default. Any changes in product/customers/transaction properties will be automatically validated. For safety, it is recommended to de-activate this option once in production to make sure no unwanted changes are automatically published. However, if not activated, changes in the configuration will not be considered until published otherwise and, in the case of property deletions, the data sync might fail until the changes are published. Publishing of the configuration can be done by re-activating this option and running a full data sync again, or by publishing the configuration directly in Boxalino Data Intelligence web-admin.
